argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | plydiv.pl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x + y ) e. S ) |
| 2 |  | plydiv.tm | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S ) ) -> ( x x. y ) e. S ) |
| 3 |  | plydiv.rc | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ x =/= 0 ) ) -> ( 1 / x ) e. S ) |
| 4 |  | plydiv.m1 | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. S ) |
| 5 |  | plydiv.f | |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 6 |  | plydiv.g | |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
| 7 |  | plydiv.z | |- ( ph -> G =/= 0p ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( F oF - ( G oF x. ( F quot G ) ) ) = ( F oF - ( G oF x. ( F quot G ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_quotlem | |- ( ph -> ( ( F quot G ) e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ ( ( F oF - ( G oF x. ( F quot G ) ) ) = 0p \/ ( deg ` ( F oF - ( G oF x. ( F quot G ) ) ) ) < ( deg ` G ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> ( F quot G ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) |
